feedback.aiIntro: Here's how to improve your solution:
feedback.aisuggestion:
üß† Optimizing Two Sum

Your current solution might be checking every pair ‚Äî that‚Äôs O(n¬≤) time.

Here‚Äôs how you can improve it:

1. **Think about storing elements you've already seen** ‚Äî is there a way to remember their positions?
2. **What if you could look up the complement (target - current number) instantly?** That could avoid the inner loop entirely.
3. **Try using a hash map** to keep track of indices. Lookups are fast ‚Äî O(1).
4. Loop through the array once and decide what you need to store or check at each step.
5. Don't forget to handle edge cases, like duplicate values or no valid pair.

Can you build this logic step by step?

preview.practiceDescription: Practice problems from top tech companies with our structured learning paths and company-specific question sets

header.title: Your Coding
header.subtitle: From problem to solution, with AI-powered guidance every step of the way

section1.title: Start Your Coding Journey
section1.description: Begin with understanding the problem. Read carefully, analyze the requirements, and plan your approach. Every great solution starts with a clear understanding.

section2.title: Write Your Code
section2.description: Transform your ideas into code. Use the editor to implement your solution step by step. Don't worry about perfection - focus on getting your logic right first.

section3.title: When Things Don't Work
section3.description: Stuck? Failed tests? No worries! This is part of the learning process. Every developer faces challenges - it's how we grow and improve our skills.

section4.title: AI-Powered Assistance
section4.description: Get personalized help when you need it. Our AI analyzes your code, understands your mistakes, and provides tailored suggestions to guide you forward.

journey.dontWorry: Don't worry! This is part of learning.

ai.title: AI Assistant
ai.suggestion1: üí° I noticed you're missing a return statement in your function.
ai.suggestion2: üîç Try adding proper error handling for edge cases.
ai.suggestion3: ‚ö° Consider using a hash map for O(n) time complexity.

header.subtitle: Our intelligent platform combines cutting-edge AI with proven methodologies to deliver personalized learning experiences that adapt to your unique pace and goals.

step1.title: AI-Powered Pattern Recognition
step1.description: Advanced algorithms analyze your coding patterns and identify knowledge gaps with precision, creating a personalized learning roadmap tailored to your unique strengths and areas for improvement.

step2.title: Adaptive Learning Engine
step2.description: Our intelligent system continuously adapts to your progress, delivering personalized problem sets that match your skill level and target company requirements, ensuring optimal learning efficiency.

step3.title: Real-World Interview Simulation
step3.description: Experience authentic interview scenarios from leading tech companies with real-time feedback, performance analytics, and comprehensive preparation for technical interviews.

testimonials.title: Building the Future of Tech Education
testimonials.subtitle: Join hundreds of developers who are accelerating their learning with our platform. We're shaping the next generation of tech education - be part of the journey.

items.quote: Feels like having a senior developer guiding me 24/7.
